headline: Will the Houston Asphalt Plant Sale Reshape Vulcan Materials' (VMC) Texas Market Strategy?
summary: In the past week, Vulcan Materials sold eight hot-mix asphalt plants in the Houston area to Construction Partners, Inc., transferring plant operations, crews, and equipment to Durwood Greene Construction Co. as part of the deal. This move marks a shift in Vulcan's footprint within a high-growth Texas market and raises questions about its future regional strategy. We'll explore how the sale of Vulcan's Houston asphalt plants could impact its investment narrative and future growth...
